songs.title: Potion
songs.lyrics:
Baby you
You got something
You got something more
I can't believe it's you i'm praying for
The stars aligned now, you right by my side
Girl i can make you shine in the night

I feel i'm dream
That ass i never see
Booty so big it wobble de wobble when she go
How you fit in them jeans
Girl i could never understand
I fuck her so good
Now she be callin' me the man
Aw yeah
You got something special
You unleash the beast inside me
I'll give you all my pleasures
Wrap my arms around you baby

Don't need no hesitations, (no no) no
Feels like we're elevating (pickin' up high)
So high
Girl you're my medication (yeah yeah) ohh
One dose of me and you gon get hooked
Mixing up the liquor pour it up

Take a sip of this potion (potion potion)
Take a sip of this potion (potion potion)
Take a sip of this potion (potion potion)
Take a sip of this potion (potion potion)

I know feel the vibe
Baby girl you far from the basic
You looking like a snack when ya naked
Assalamalakum
We can take a trip
To dubai first class
Flying so high
I know fucking wit that
I'm speaking the facts
No need to flex
Full in effect
Take a sip and relax
I wanna give it to ya right now
I wanna give it to ya right now
Ohh yeah yeah yeah

Don't need no hesitations, (no no) no
Feels like we're elevating (pickin' up high)
So high
Girl you're my medication (yeah yeah) ohh
One dose of me and you gon get hooked
Mixing up the liquor pour it up

Take a sip of this potion (potion potion)
Take a sip of this potion (potion potion)
Take a sip of this potion (potion potion)
Take a sip of this potion (potion potion)
